collection.name: Kibatsu Mecha
collection.description: [Kibatsu Mecha](https://kibatsumecha.com) is a collection of 2222 unique 1/1 hand generated, fully animated NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. This is the genesis collection of the Kibatsu Corp. brand and an integral component of the lore of Megacity Kibatsu, a world and story developed by artist & animator Jerry Liu (aka [SloppyJ44](https://twitter.com/SloppyJ44))
